text: hi everyone, i'm new on here. I'm currently working on bet angel automation for pre-race UK horses. as it fits my mind set and availability. However, i'm struggling to see where the opportunities are in what appear to be random markets. I hear stories of some very advanced algos, which makes me think if i'm going to come up with a profitable bot long term I need to beat them...which in reality is unlikely! so how do you approach it?
